subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In-Kyung Kim sank a 45-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a three-under-par 69 on Saturday, taking a one-shot lead after the second round of the L.P.G.A. Kolon Championship in Incheon, South Korea. Kim shot a bogey-free round and totaled five-under 139 heading into Sunday’s finale of the 54-hole event. She leads Hee-Won Han (69) and Karen Stupples (70), who had four birdies in her opening 10 holes.
